Command.name: addactor
Command.desc: add a new actor to the current active scene

Command.name: advancetime
Command.desc: advancetime any queued time event for the calling entity

Command.name: applytexturepack
Command.desc: apply a given texture pack if not exist download from the provided url

Command.name: block
Command.desc: set block attribute for all blocks of that type

Command.name: blockimage
Command.desc: load image as blocks at given position

Command.name: cheat
Command.desc: whether to turn on or off cheating

Command.name: circle
Command.desc: 以人物所在坐标为原点,在[plane]对应的平面上，以[radius]值为半径做一个圆形方块。

Param.name: plane
Param.desc: 填入x、y、z其中一个字母，表示在那个平面上用手上的方块生成圆形。

Param.name: radius
Param.desc: 填入一个数字，表示圆形的半径。

Instance.desc: 以2为半径，在角色脚底做一个圆形方块。
以人物所在坐标为原点，在x轴垂直平面上，以2为半径做一个圆形方块

Command.name: clearbag
Command.desc: clear bag of a given player

Command.name: clicktocontinue
Command.desc: whether to turn on or off clicktocontinue

Command.quick_ref: /clone [-update] from_x from_y from_z (dx dy dz) to to_x to_y to_z (dx dy dz)
Command.name: clone

Command.quick_ref: /testblocks from_x from_y from_z (dx dy dz) to to_x to_y to_z
Command.name: compareblocks
Command.desc: Compare the blocks at two locations in cuboid regions.

Command.name: connect
Command.desc: connect to a given private server

Command.name: create
Command.desc: create item, entity, model, character, etc.

Command.name: day
Command.desc: /day 20 set how many mins in a day.

Command.name: disableinput
Command.desc: disableinput for a given entity or block entity

Command.name: dostring
Command.desc: load and do string in sandbox environment

Command.name: facing
Command.desc: set facing of a given player.

Command.name: fill
Command.desc: 使用手中的方块或者[block_id]填充选中范围(包括空气)的所有空间。

Instance.desc: 使用手中的方块填充选中范围(包括空气)的所有空间。
使用ID为62的草方块填充选中范围(包括空气)的所有空间。

Command.name: focus
Command.desc: 附身在当前世界某个角色[@playname]身上，若角色名字不存在或为空，则附身回主角身上。

Param.name: @playername
Param.desc: 填入当前世界某个角色的名字，表示在附身到那个角色身上。

Instance.desc: 附身在当前世界名为Jack的角色身上，附身期间可随意控制Jack的行为。
附身回主角身上。

Command.name: fov
Command.desc: change field of view with an animation

Command.name: fps
Command.desc: 进入/取消第一人称模式。

Param.name: true|1
Param.desc: 填入[true]或者[1]进入第一人称模式。

Param.name: false|0
Param.desc: 填入[false]或者[0]取消第一人称模式。

Instance.desc: 进入第一人称模式。
进入第一人称模式。
取消第一人称模式。
取消第一人称模式。

Command.name: give
Command.desc: give a certain item to a given player

Command.name: if
Command.desc: do a command if var1==var2, also support operators like < <= >= >

Command.name: install
Command.desc: install a texture package from url

Command.name: jumpto
Command.desc: goto a given line or start or end of line

Command.name: light
Command.desc: set light block color. if no parameter, 1,1,1 is used.

Command.name: loadregion
Command.desc: load region that contains a given point.

Command.name: loadtemplate
Command.desc: load template to the given position

Command.name: loadworld
Command.desc: loadworld a world by worldname or url or relative to parent directory

Command.quick_ref: /mirror [clone|no_clone] [x|y|z] from_x from_y from_z (dx dy dz) to pivot_x pivot_y pivot_z
Command.name: mirror
Command.desc: mirror a region of blocks to another region alone agiven axis

Command.name: mode
Command.desc: locking game mode to the given value

Command.name: moviecamera
Command.desc: enable or disable movie camera in the movieclip block.

Command.name: music
Command.desc: change background music. specify a number for internal music

Command.name: name
Command.desc: give a name to the current item in hand

Command.name: offsetworld
Command.desc: offset the world vertically to make room for scene

Command.name: pause
Command.desc: pause any queued time event for the calling entity

Command.name: quest
Command.desc: start or complete the current step in the quest

Command.name: register
Command.desc: register a new user or change password

Command.name: replace
Command.desc: 把当前选中方块中的[from_id]替换为[to_id]。

Instance.desc: 把当前选中方块中的ID为62的草方块替换为ID为5的雪方块。

Command.name: replacetexture
Command.desc: replace a block texture to another texture or 0

Command.name: resume
Command.desc: resume any queued time event for the calling entity

Command.quick_ref: /rotate [x|y|z] from_x from_y from_z (dx dy dz) angle [to pivot_x pivot_y pivot_z]
Command.name: rotate
Command.desc: rotate a region of blocks to along a given axis

Command.name: rule
Command.desc: show all rules or reset rules

Command.name: scaling
Command.desc: set scaling of a given player.

Command.name: sel
Command.desc: select all block below the current player's feet

Command.name: selectobj
Command.desc: 选中主角视野画面中的特殊机关方块，比如拉杆，踏板等。

Instance.desc: 选中主角视野画面中的特殊机关方块。

Command.quick_ref: /setblock x y z (dx dy dz) [block] [data] [where sameblock]
Command.name: setblock
sky
Command.desc: change sky model or its textures

Command.name: speeddecay
Command.desc: speed lost per second when in air or on surface of block

Command.name: sphere
Command.desc: 以人物所在坐标为原点,以[radius]值为半径做一个圆球形立体方块。

Param.name: radius
Param.desc: 填入数字作为圆球形立体方块的半径。

Param.name: SolidMode
Param.desc: 填入[true]或者不填，则新建一个实心的圆球形立体方块，反之填入[false]则新建一个空心的圆球形立体方块。

Instance.desc: 以人物所在坐标为原点,做一个半径为5的实心圆球形立体方块。
以人物所在坐标为原点,做一个半径为5的空心圆球形立体方块。

Command.name: startserver
Command.desc: start private server on host port

Command.name: t
Command.desc: 使得已编写的代码延迟[seconds]时间后启动。

Param.name: seconds
Param.desc: 填入数字，使得代码在规定好的第几秒启动。

Param.name: ~seconds
Param.desc: 填入数字，使得代码在距离上一个/t代码几秒后启动。

Instance.desc: 此行后的代码将会在10秒后启动。
此行后的代码将会在第20秒后启动。
此行后的代码将会在10秒后启动。
此行后的代码将会在第20秒后启动。

Command.quick_ref: /testblock x y z [(dx dy dz)] blockid [data]
Command.name: testblock
Command.desc: return true if all blocks match a given one

Command.name: text
Command.desc: show movie text at the bottom of the screen

Command.name: tickrate
Command.desc: set how many times per second an entity need to be updated

Command.name: time
Command.desc: set time of day. 0 or nil means noon

Command.name: tip
Command.desc: show a screen message to a channel name with a given string

Command.name: tp
Command.desc: 将主角传送到一个指定坐标点。

Instance.desc: 将主角传送到一个坐标 19242 11 19178 处。

Command.quick_ref: /translate from_x from_y from_z (dx dy dz) to offset_x offset_y offset_z
Command.name: translate

Param.name: from_x from_y from_z
Param.desc: 填入原方块X、Y、Z的坐标数字。

Param.name: [(dx dy dz)]
Param.desc: 填入以上一个坐标为原点的相对X、Y、Z的坐标数字。

Param.name: offset_x offset_y offset_z
Param.desc: 填入要复制到的位置X、Y、Z的相对坐标数字。

Instance.desc: 将坐标19242 11 19178处的方块移动到原坐标的上方5格处。
将坐标19242 11 19178处的方块移动到原坐标的X轴正方向5格处。
将坐标19242 11 19178处的方块移动到原坐标的X轴负方向5格处。
将坐标19242 11 19178处，体积为5x5x5的方块群移动到原坐标的上方5格处。

Command.name: velocity
Command.desc: add or set velocity to a given mob entity.

Command.name: where
Command.desc: 获取当前角色的坐标，若填入参数则获取当前角色头顶[offset_y]的坐标。

Param.name: offset_y
Param.desc: 填入Y坐标轴的位移，获取当前角色头顶坐标。

Instance.desc: 获取当前角色的坐标。
获取当前角色头顶位移5的坐标。
